item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“durent, post:2, topic:174487”]Hello, this isen;t exactly what you asked for but its good enough :),
Um simpley just search "yell after you find your Yell command
just replace the whole thing with

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
String playerTitle = “”;
if(playerRights == 3) playerTitle = “[Owner]”;

                 if(playerRights == 2)   playerTitle = "[Administrator]";
                 
                 if(playerRights == 1)   playerTitle = "[Moderator]";

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerTitle+""+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
}[/code]
No thanks need’d have a nice day :D[/quote]thx work now

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @durent durent
item.description:
@durent wrote:

Hello, this isen;t exactly what you asked for but its good enough :),
Um simpley just search "yell after you find your Yell command
just replace the whole thing with

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
String playerTitle = “”;
if(playerRights == 3) playerTitle = “[Owner]”;

                 if(playerRights == 2)   playerTitle = "[Administrator]";
                 
                 if(playerRights == 1)   playerTitle = "[Moderator]";

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerTitle+""+playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
}[/code]
No thanks need’d have a nice day
